title: Facebook user share in the United States 2019 , by gender
summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Percentage of users for 2 number of Sexs.
The Percentage of users is appeared to be the highest at Sex Female and lowest at Sex Male.
The highest Sex Female has 7.4 more Percentage of users than the lowest Sex Male.
min_summary: This bar chart has 2 columns on the x axis representing Sex, and Percentage of users in each Sex on the y axis.
The Percentage of users is appeared to be the highest at Sex Female and lowest at Sex Male.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Percentage of users for 2 number of Sexs.
The Percentage of users is appeared to be the highest at Sex Female and lowest at Sex Male.
The highest Sex Female has 7.4 more Percentage of users than the lowest Sex Male.
max_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Percentage of users for 2 number of Sexs.
The Percentage of users is appeared to be the highest at Sex Female and lowest at Sex Male.
The Percentage of users of Sex Male is 1.16% smaller than the maximum value at Female.
The Sex Female tends to be 1.07 percent higher than average.
Summing up the values of all Sexs, we get total 100.0.
